statement.p: In 38.46 of the last 26 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{26}}={0.3846}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{26}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3846}\cdot{26}={9.9996}. We round that as requested to 10 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
